headline: Sempra (SRE) Prioritizes Long-Term Growth Over Short-Term Challenges
summary: ClearBridge Investments, an investment management company, released its “ClearBridge Large Cap Value Strategy” first quarter 2025 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. The S&P 500 Index declined by -4.3% in Q1 2025 due to a tariff war and a shift away from AI-related tech stocks. Amid the tech-led sell-off, the […]
